results.name: 은화
issues: Diamond emblem is quite small and may not be clearly visible at smaller sizes
Multiple overlapping circles create slight complexity
Decorative corner circles may be unnecessary detail
fix_suggestions: Increase diamond size to make it more prominent
Simplify the coin structure to use a single circle with gradient
Consider removing the small decorative circles for cleaner design

results.name: 지폐 묶음
issues: Multiple gradients create slight depth effect
Complex layering with many overlapping elements
Bill details are quite small and geometric rather than organic
fix_suggestions: Simplify to solid fills or single gradient
Reduce number of stacked bill layers
Make bill details slightly larger and more rounded
Consider more organic curved shapes for better Kurzgesagt style match

results.name: 돈 자루
issues: Dollar sign construction is overly complex and fragmented
Multiple overlapping ellipses and paths create cluttered appearance
Bag neck/tie area has awkward geometric construction
Dollar sign not immediately recognizable due to complex path structure
Gradients add some dimensionality that reduces flat vector style
fix_suggestions: Simplify dollar sign to clean S-curve path with vertical line
Use single ellipse for bag body instead of multiple overlapping shapes
Create cleaner bag neck with simple gathered fabric representation
Reduce gradient complexity for flatter appearance
Consolidate dollar sign elements into fewer, cleaner shapes

results.name: 지갑
issues: Heavy use of radial gradients creates 3D appearance
Wallet represented as abstract ellipses rather than recognizable wallet shape
Bills and cards are too small and positioned awkwardly
Overall composition lacks the organic, friendly Kurzgesagt style
fix_suggestions: Replace radial gradients with flat colors or simple linear gradients
Use more geometric wallet shape with clear opening/fold
Make bills and cards larger and more prominently displayed
Simplify to fewer, cleaner shapes with more organic curves

results.name: 신용카드
issues: Uses gradients which reduces flat vector style
Card shape is too geometric/rectangular for Kurzgesagt organic style
Small chip details may not be visible at smaller sizes
fix_suggestions: Replace gradients with solid fills using expected colors
Add more rounded corners and organic curves to the card shape
Simplify chip design to single rectangle without small internal elements
Consider adding subtle shadow or depth cues typical of Kurzgesagt style

results.name: 상승 라인 차트
issues: Line segments represented as rotated ellipses create confusing visual
Chart doesn't clearly show upward trending line
Rotated ellipses appear as disconnected segments rather than continuous line
Unconventional approach makes chart less recognizable
fix_suggestions: Replace rotated ellipses with proper line/path elements connecting data points
Use polyline or path element to create continuous upward trending line
Keep glowing data points but connect them with solid line segments
Ensure line clearly shows upward trend from bottom-left to top-right

results.name: 하락 라인 차트
issues: ellipses create confusing visual elements that don't represent chart lines
missing actual connecting lines between data points
chart doesn't clearly read as a downward trending line chart
ellipses behind points serve no clear purpose
fix_suggestions: replace ellipses with actual polyline or path connecting the data points
use stroke property on connecting line instead of filled ellipses
ensure line clearly shows downward trend from left to right
consider adding chart axes for better readability

results.name: 막대 차트
issues: Radial gradients add slight dimensional effect reducing flat vector style
Three identical gradient definitions create unnecessary code duplication
fix_suggestions: Use solid fills (#CE93D8) instead of gradients for flatter appearance
Consolidate into single gradient definition reused across all bars
Consider slightly more rounded corners (rx='25') for more organic Kurzgesagt feel

results.name: 원형 차트
issues: Uses gradients instead of flat colors
Colors don't exactly match expected values (#26A69A, #FFB74D, #F06292)
Gradients create depth that conflicts with flat vector style
fix_suggestions: Replace radial gradients with solid flat colors using the exact expected values
Use fill='#26A69A' for teal segment, fill='#FFB74D' for orange segment, fill='#F06292' for pink segment

results.name: 상승 퍼센트
issues: Percent symbol is poorly formed - diagonal line doesn't connect circles properly
Arrow positioning makes it unclear if it's part of the percent or separate
Overall icon doesn't clearly read as 'percent up' concept
fix_suggestions: Reposition circles and diagonal line to form a proper percent symbol (%)
Move arrow to top-right or integrate it more clearly with the percent symbol
Consider making the diagonal line thicker for better visibility

results.name: 은행 건물
issues: Radial gradients create subtle 3D depth effect reducing flat vector appearance
Building structure uses only ellipses making it less architecturally recognizable
Columns are too thin and vertical, not typical classical bank columns
fix_suggestions: Replace radial gradients with solid fills to achieve true flat vector style
Add more rectangular elements mixed with rounded shapes for better bank building recognition
Make columns wider and add capital details to look more like classical bank architecture

results.name: 금고
issues: Uses gradients which reduce flat vector style
Safe appears quite small in the 512x512 viewBox
Gradient colors deviate slightly from expected flat colors
fix_suggestions: Replace radial gradients with solid fills using expected colors
Increase safe size to better fill the canvas
Use flat #78909C for safe body, #FFD54F for dial, #B0BEC5 for handle

results.name: 저울
issues: Radial gradients create 3D effect reducing flat vector style
Chain links as separate ellipses rather than organic shapes
Overall design feels mechanical rather than organic/friendly
Colors close to expected but gradients vary from flat specification
fix_suggestions: Replace radial gradients with solid fills using specified colors #FFD54F, #B0BEC5, #78909C
Simplify chain design to fewer, more organic curved elements
Add subtle rounded corners and softer curves to make design more friendly
Consider making pans slightly asymmetrical or adding gentle curves for more organic feel

results.name: 시계
issues: Clock hands are poorly designed - using ellipses creates confusing overlapping shapes
Hour markers use mix of circles at different positions making time unclear
No clear time indication - hands don't point to recognizable hour positions
Gradients add slight complexity against pure flat design
fix_suggestions: Replace ellipse hands with proper line or rectangular shapes pointing from center
Standardize hour markers - use consistent small circles or lines at 12, 3, 6, 9 positions
Position hands to show clear readable time like 3:00 or 10:10
Consider using flat fills instead of gradients for purer flat design

results.name: 모래시계
issues: Complex gradients reduce flat vector style
Glass bulbs overlap awkwardly with gold rims
Sand distribution looks unnatural for flowing hourglass
fix_suggestions: Simplify gradients to solid fills or simple two-stop gradients
Adjust z-order so glass appears properly contained by gold frame
Make top sand smaller and bottom sand larger to show more realistic flow progression

results.name: 새싹
issues: radial gradients create subtle 3D effect
soil color doesn't match expected #8D6E63
stem uses ellipse instead of organic curved shape
fix_suggestions: replace radial gradients with solid fills for flatter look
change soil gradient to use #8D6E63 as base color
use path element for more natural stem curve

results.name: 나무
issues: Uses complex gradients instead of flat colors
Too many overlapping leaf circles create visual clutter
Trunk shape (ellipse) appears overly narrow and unrealistic
Gradients make it less flat vector style
fix_suggestions: Replace gradients with solid flat colors matching the specification
Simplify leaf detail to 2-3 larger shapes instead of 8 small circles
Use a wider rectangular trunk shape for better proportions
Remove complex lighting gradients to achieve true flat design

results.name: 악수
issues: hands don't appear to be actually shaking/connected
abstract representation makes it unclear as handshake
hand anatomy is very simplified with just circles
connection area is too abstract
fix_suggestions: create interlocked fingers showing actual hand-to-hand contact
add thumb elements to make hands more recognizable
position hands to show clear grip/shake gesture
reduce opacity variations in connection area for clearer definition

results.name: 과녁
issues: Uses gradients which adds dimensionality contrary to flat vector style
Arrow design is confusing - appears as directional arrows pointing outward rather than a single arrow hitting bullseye
Complex multi-directional arrow design doesn't clearly represent target achievement concept
fix_suggestions: Replace gradients with solid flat colors
Simplify to single arrow pointing toward or stuck in center of target
Use expected colors more precisely (#EF5350 for red, #FFD54F for arrow)

results.name: 보안 방패
issues: Shield shape uses angular path instead of organic curves
Teal color is darker than expected #26A69A
Checkmark path is angular rather than smooth
fix_suggestions: Use curved path for more organic shield shape with rounded top
Adjust gradient colors to include specified teal #26A69A
Smooth the checkmark path with curves for better Kurzgesagt style

results.name: 전구
issues: Gradients add slight dimensional depth
Complex ray positioning could be simplified
fix_suggestions: Consider using solid fills instead of radial gradients for flatter style
Simplify ray arrangement to more symmetrical pattern

results.name: 상승 화살표
issues: gradient creates slight depth effect reducing flatness
sharp corners on arrow despite rx attribute
shadow ellipse adds dimensional element
fix_suggestions: use solid fill instead of radial gradient for flatter appearance
ensure rx attribute properly rounds arrow corners
consider removing shadow ellipse for pure flat style

results.name: 하락 화살표
issues: rx attribute on path element is invalid and will be ignored
Arrow corners are sharp angles rather than rounded organic shapes typical of Kurzgesagt style
Path coordinates could be more optimized for cleaner geometry
fix_suggestions: Remove the invalid rx='20' attribute from the path element
Add rounded corners by modifying the path to use curved segments or apply border-radius through proper SVG techniques
Refine path coordinates to create smoother, more organic curved edges that better match Kurzgesagt's characteristic rounded aesthetic

results.name: 체크 원
issues: checkmark uses stroke instead of fill
stroke width creates outline effect
fix_suggestions: convert checkmark stroke to filled path shape
use fill-only approach for checkmark to match flat vector style

results.name: X 원
issues: Circle uses red gradient (#FF5722 to #B71C1C) instead of expected flat red #EF5350
fix_suggestions: Replace gradient fill with flat red color #EF5350 to match expected specification

results.name: 경고
issues: Triangle path uses rx attribute which is invalid for path elements
Radial gradient creates slight dimensional effect rather than pure flat design
Sharp triangle corners don't fully match organic shape expectation
fix_suggestions: Remove rx='20' from path element and use rounded corners in path definition instead
Consider using linear gradient or solid fill for flatter appearance
Add subtle corner rounding to triangle path coordinates for more organic feel

results.name: 별
issues: Multiple overlapping gradients reduce flatness
Center circle adds unnecessary complexity
Extra highlight dot creates busy appearance
fix_suggestions: Use single gradient for the star shape
Remove the center circle overlay
Simplify to just the main star polygon with subtle glow
